assignments.description: For case with Request to Store resolution chosen, we will apply a 'fake' resolution in order to be able to update the request. (Avoid Validation rule on Store and client mandatory). This process will continue in Request Creation flow

variables.description: Domain screen page can have no value, so the Next screen wil be automatically displayed. The next screen with Previous button can't come back to the Domaine screen (it should be back to the Category screen)
